reference_summary:
Precious LUXURY CAVIAR GEL CREAM-sheer and weightless,rich with precious caviar extract,full of vitamins and minerals.Smooth skin.Light texture,quickly absorbed. 1.7fl.oz(50Ml) {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.56 x 2.56 x 2.24 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} I really want to give this product 5 stars, but the heavy perfumey smell is what downgrades it to a 4 star review.

Other than that, this product is GREAT for the face. It is chock full of great ingredients of the skin, and looks like a super high end spa face cream. I love that it has caviar extract in it, which makes it not run-of-the-mill. It absorbs so quicky into the skin and leaves my face feeling soft and supple for days afterward.

If only it didn't have such a strong perfume smell, then I'd wear it more often. If you are sensitive or allergic to perfumed creams, then I would skip this. The smell lingers heavily all day. Nice facial cream, but heavy on the perfumes. JUNG SAEM MOOL OFFICIAL] JUNGSAEMMOOL Minifying Cica Mist Balm JUNG SAEM MOOL {'Brand': 'JUNG SAEM MOOL', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Country/Region Of Origin': 'Republic of Korea', 'Package Dimensions': '3.23 x 3.07 x 1.14 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} This is a Korean face balm, that is supposed to sooth sensitive skin and cover up redness on the skin. The instructions and all the ads on Amazon are in Korean, and I HIGHLY recommend that the sellers switch this to include English instructions. I had to go to their website in order to find out the ingredients and what it was supposed to do for the skin, and most people aren't going to do that.
To continue, the balm contains 2 plant ingredientspine sprouts and centella asiatica roots. The cica pine water helps sooth and moisturize sensitive skin. The color in the balm comes from calamine powder, which helps cover red areas of the skin. It is a 100% vegan formula. The balm comes in a compact with a puff applicator. The puff is eco-friendly and anti-bacterial. This is meant to be applied as the last step during the skincare routine and before you apply your makeup.

Overall, I found this product easy to apply. You dip the poof into the cream balm, and then apply it to the skin. It has an almost creamy texture on the skin, and absorbs in quickly. It has a slight white cast when I used it but that went away as it absorbed in. I was hoping to use this as a color corrective on red areas on my skin before I applied concealer (I currently do not use foundation). Overall I think it is nice, but it really hasn't gotten rid of any redness on my skin. I do like the way it feels though and I think it helps my makeup go on smoother, so I plan to keep using it. Calming face balm essence | Welcome to Miami Eyeshadow Palette | 12 Highly Pigmented, Blendable Shades | Matte & Metallic | Vegan & Cruelty Free | Made Without Oil, Fragrance, Parabens, Alcohol, & Microplastic Particles essence cosmetics ["¡BIENVENIDOS A MIAMI! With the essence welcome to MIAMI eyeshadow palette, we're bringing the sunny vibes of Florida into our make-up bags. The bright and bold color palette is inspired by the iconic Miami beaches and art deco landmarks. The 12 highly-pigmented are sure to create a feeling of happiness with their nude, pink, violet, turquoise and green shades. Thanks to the diverse finishes ranging from matte to metallic, you can create countless looks for any occasion. This product is vegan & cruelty free and is formulated without oil, fragrance, parabens, alcohol, & microplastic particles."] {'Brand': 'essence cosmetics', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic, Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals, Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Fragrance Free, Oil Free, Alcohol Free, Microplastic Particle Free, Paraben Free', 'Product Dimensions': '6.73 x 2.52 x 0.47 inches; 3.25 Ounces', 'Item model number': '934930', 'Manufacturer': 'essence cosmetics', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} This is a nice palette of 12 various shades. It comes in a flip case with a mirror. They are very pigmented, and were fun to play with. I went all out on the shimmery dark pink and gold, as I've always wanted to try bright shimmery shadow. The colors are very buildable and there was minimal fallout. I loved how bright these are and how well they show up on my skin tone. Great for a wow look! Fun bright colors! Eye Corrector Serum With Triple Peptides 1 oz. (28g) by BeautyLux BeautyLux {'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'BeautyLux', 'Item Weight': '28 Grams', 'Package Dimensions': '4.83 x 2.28 x 2.28 inches; 0.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '850030106148'} This eye serum is supposed to diminish dark circles and the appearance of fine lines through the use of peptides, citric acid and bergamot oil. I found that this serum went on smoothly, and you only need one or two drops to cover both eye areas. It absorbed in nicely. My eye area looked hydrated and more refreshed after use.

I do agree with the other reviewer who mentioned that they expected a box for the pump bottle, not it arriving just in the bottle and shrink wrapped. The shrink wrapping felt a little cheap and it was also frustrating to get off the bottle. Nice peptide eye serum Hook Ya Sport Non-Nano Mineral Sunscreen 3oz, 2 Pack 6oz Total, Reef Safe, UVA/UVB Protection, Octinoxate & Oxybenzone Free, Bait Safe, Boat Safe, Non-Greasy, No Fragrance, Ultralight Finish, Approved for use in Hawaii and Mexico, Made in the USA Hook'Ya {'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 3 x 3 inches; 3 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': "Hook'Ya", 'Country of Origin': 'USA'} Nice reef safe mineral sunscreen in a squeeze bottle. I used this for a day on the lake, and was well protected from the sun. The sunscreen has a very faint smell, is creamy and absorbs easily into the skin without any of the dreaded super white cast. I didn't have any irritation from this sunscreen. Overall I really liked it, and I'm happy it comes in a 2 pack. Hook Ya suncreen works well! REBONCEL Aqua Rich Hydrating Face Foam Cleanser Gentle Hypoallergenic pH Balance Korean Skin Care Face Wash Cleansing Foam(8.45 fl.oz 250ml) Reboncel {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Brand': 'Reboncel', 'Material Feature': 'Plant Based', 'Material Type Free': 'Paraben Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 3.27 x 2.32 inches; 11.71 Ounces'} Giant bottle of Foam cleanser. Light scent. I had no irritation when using this product. It cleaned my face and left it feeling soft and hydrated afterwards. Great cleanser
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Makeup Enthusiast:** The user maintains a keen interest in high-quality skincare products with beneficial formulations and continues to explore vibrant makeup, particularly versatile eyeshadow palettes for creative expression.
- **Texture Preference:** They favor lightweight, quickly absorbed skincare formulations and blendable, pigmented textures in makeup, ensuring both comfort and performance.
- **Sensitivity to Fragrance:** The user is sensitive to strong fragrances, prioritizing both skincare and makeup products that are free from added fragrances and irritants.
- **Quality over Quantity:** They value premium, luxury formulations across skincare and makeup, showing a willingness to invest in effective, innovative products.
- **Critical Evaluator:** The user provides discerning product evaluations, emphasizing personal experiences, particularly regarding efficacy and ease of use.
- **Color Exploration:** Recently, they have embraced bold and bright makeup colors, delighting in the creative versatility of such hues while maintaining high standards for pigmentation and minimal fallout.
- **Recent Product Experience:** The user had a positive experience with a foam cleanser, appreciating its gentle formulation, hydration benefits, and lack of irritation, reinforcing their preference for products that offer both effective cleansing and comfort.
- **Review Engagement:** The user actively engages in providing detailed feedback on products, reflecting their critical evaluation style and commitment to sharing insights based on personal experiences. Their latest review highlighted hydration and a pleasant user experience, aligning with their standards for quality and performance.
